CustomField.description: If the campaign start date is not null, then based on Livongo's fiscal/calendar year, this field returns a the year in text format. This field helps facilitate reporting that features grouping.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the campaign start date is not null, then based on Livongo's fiscal/calendar year, this field returns a the year in text format. This field helps facilitate reporting that features column groupings.
CustomField.label: Campaign Start Date Year (Text)
